name: Acetanilidum

Heart: Weak, irregular, with blue mucous membranes, albuminuria, edema of feet and ankles
Eyes: Pallor of optic discs, contracted visual field and shrinking retinal vessel; mydriasis
Head: Enlarged sensation
Fainting
Moral depravity

details: Depresses heart, respiration and blood pressure, lowers temperature. Cyanosis and collapse. Increased susceptibility to cold. Destroys red blood corpuscles; pallor.
dosage: Used as a sedative and antipyretic for various forms of headache and neuralgia in doses of one to three grains. For the homeopathic indications use the third potency.
